unittitle_ssm: Joseph and Raffaela Tarone Salvagna photographs and papers
abstract_ssm: The collection comprises six photographs of the Salvagna family, including a wedding portrait of Joseph and Raffaela Salvagna, who were married in Brooklyn on October 2, 1938, as well as a birth certification document and an identity card of Raffaela Salvagna.
